attributes.action: Withdraw ALL taxpayer funding being used to pay for criminal activity by RBS senior executives.
attributes.additional_details: EVERY DAY there are more revelations about taxpayer pounds being used by RBS senior executives to commit criminal acts, today it's about their New York branch.  There is no threat to these people because the UK taxpayer is always there to pick up the tab.  This support, which us effectively involving EVERY UK taxpayer in the commission of criminal acts, MUST be stopped and the criminal bankers MUST be made to pay for their own criminal activities.
